title: Heated floors*, LEED Gold Building, Expansive windows
posting_body: This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 528 Sq.
Boardwalk steps in with a definite direction, a clear point of view.
This is luxury apartment living with condo-quality styling, in the very heart of Kirkland.
Boardwalk is located adjacent to the new, vibrant village of Kirkland Urban which features QFC, Tutta Bella, Soi, Chainline Brewing Company, Caffe Ladro and many more services, shops and restaurants.
Surrounded by wide gathering areas and lush green landscaping, it’s a place that feels comfortable.
Where people stop easily and often to connect with friends, and linger over coffee, or a glass of wine, or the day’s events.
Next to Peter Kirk Park and the acclaimed Kirkland Performance Center, a stroll to shops and restaurants, even a high-end natural grocery right in the building.
And just down the road from its own private beach club stocked with paddleboards, bikes, kayaks and more.
When your path diverges from the expected, the typical, you’ll see that all roads lead to Boardwalk.
A maximum of two pets are allowed in your Boardwalk home.
Breed restrictions apply, no exotic animals allowed.
